@zovuna_psn said in List of Generic Stances/Motions:

It's not the same in 21.

Dang sorry, wish I would have waited to share.

I just edited the OP with his updated 21 list.

I don't like that they took off the All-star veteran and legend pitching styles out also where is Roy Halladay and Yordano Ventura and a bunch of others

@zovuna_psn said in MLB 21 List of Generic Stances/Motions:

So they must have taken out Roy Halladay.

Yea I seen that and I don't like it. They also took out Yordano Ventura he was a pitcher for the Royals until he tragically died in a car crash in his home country of the Dominican Republic he was only 25
